outputs.output_descr: The Project aims to contribute to the recovery and increased resilience of the cities of Cagayan de Oro and Iligan which were severely affected by TS Sendong in December of 2011. The Project will adopt an integrated approach that would address the most critical needs of the displaced populations, while building local capacities for disaster risk reduction and management (DRMM) and longer-term recovery.

project_descr: Enabling Recovery and Resilience for TS Sendong affected areas in Northern Mindanao
project_title: Recovery and Resilience for Northern Mindanao
